intro: Aneilema geniculata, commonly known as the zigzag plant, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae and is characterized by its unique zigzagging stems. The plant produces small, white or pale yellow flowers arranged in clusters, which bloom during the wet season. Its leaves are opposite, elliptical, and often have a slightly hairy texture. Aneilema geniculata is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its attractive appearance and ability to thrive in shaded environments.
